attributes.action: Schools to provide a summer teaching provision
attributes.additional_details:
Children should have fair access to education.
Children should not suffer due to nhs resourcing issues and the potential death of adults.
Provides for disadvantaged children
Fits in with every child matters agenda.
This is abiut the future and securing ut fir all that has been lost.
attributes.background: Parliament to pass that all schools must provide some teaching provision in holidays for students to access, if they need to or want to catch up on school work due to pandemic closures

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566739
